meta.title: From BIG to THIEF
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: This week I'm featuring some favorite bands. Today's inspiration is Big Thief, a indie folk trio from Brooklyn whose lyrics and melodies always feel deeply personal. Also their song [Spud Infinity](https://open.spotify.com/track/3Q6VfeIZ1bTjWiNe2Or4LQ?si=7c6dff6bccb743ff) rhymes 'finish' with 'potato knish', which never doesn't make me smile.
